name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Central South University students added that the deceased was indeed a freshman

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement: Wu was arrested by US prosecutors on the 14th and released later that day. The case is still under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Found an interesting thing
Xinhua News Agency issued a news on the 14th, saying that its Internet celebrity studio produced a short film that mocked the American political arena, which triggered a strong response at home and abroad
The news said that the number of views on Xinhua News Agency’s overseas social media accounts alone has exceeded 1.7 million, and the news listed the interactions of various figures on Twitter with this short film.
However, in fact, the number of views of this short film was only 4552 times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
For a Twitter account with 12.2 million followers, how outrageous is 4,552 views?
For testing purposes, I just drew a little monster and it got 8,633 views in half an hour.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Youtube, the video has only been viewed 1,822 times, and there is no search result for the video on TikTok.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: By the way, this video from Xinhua News Agency has been released on major platforms for nearly five days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: But I believe that the data claimed by Xinhua News Agency in domestic media are true.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I think this is very interesting.
In fact, you can go deep into the local society to find the news you want. I believe that you can easily find people willing to be interviewed and accuse the US government on the streets of the United States.
But as China's official media, it should have brought together the most professional journalists in the country, but it uses this kind of tabloid tricks to create news, which is really hilarious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
From this incident, we can also see the current state of China's media.
The result of people being immersed in this kind of special news for a long time is that they have a huge sense of separation from the real outside world.
This separation is constantly deepening the communication gap between China and the outside world, and at the same time, this separation also reacts on ourselves, just like what happened in the past few days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the past few days on social media, we have seen that a large number of people no longer trust the new epidemic prevention policy and believe that the current situation is in a state of pessimism.
All this is precisely due to the huge gap between the virus that the news media has been constantly promoting in the past three years and the terror that has been released abroad and the sudden U-turn in the country's new crown policy.
When making these foreign news, I am afraid no one would foresee that these news will cause greater harm to themselves in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: But you have to do this because true news will make people think anyway, so you can only control the lies

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @shxj114 It means I have driven its exponential growth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Henan Province announced that the health system will temporarily cancel holidays from now until March next year.
